title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose the SWT.MULTI option in the ControlExampleText, it emits a beeping sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the bell sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not produce any sound when selecting the SWT.MULTI option, and clicking on other buttons should not generate any audible feedback either.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open ControlExampleText.
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe that a beeping sound is emitted.
4. Click on other buttons in the ControlExampleText and notice that the bell sound is still present.
